original_text: The Almighty Lord says this: Pharaoh will not feel so sad when he sees all these other dead people in their graves. He and his whole army will know that they are not the only people to have died in battle. The Almighty Lord says this: Pharaoh will not feel so sad when he sees all these other dead people in their graves. He and his whole army will know that they are not the only people to have died in battle. The Almighty Lord says this: Pharaoh will not feel so sad when he sees all these other dead people in their graves. He and his whole army will know that they are not the only people to have died in battle.
korean_text: 바로가 그들을 보고 그 모든 무리로 말미암아 위로를 받을 것임이여 칼에 죽임을 당한 바로와 그 온 군대가 그러하리로다 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh will not feel so sad
when he sees all these other dead people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 다른 모든 죽은 자들을 볼 때

sentences.original_text: will know that they are not the only people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 유일한 사람들이 아니라는 것을 알게 될 것이다
